item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:30 Chances: CNH Industrial (CNH) is committed to sustainability, innovation, and productivity, standing with farmers and construction workers. Risks: The Manufacturing - Farm Equipment industry is facing headwinds, which may impact CNH’s performance. Score:30 chances characters count - risks characters count = 30
